about_the_game:
October 17th, 1775. 6 months after the shot heard around the world. America is in a frenzy of Revolution, Violence and War in the spirit of liberty, independence, and justice. Some for less virtuous reasons. Others refuse outright and prefer the crown's stability. The City of Falmouth in the soon to be state of Maine is no exception. Radicals and Loyalists split at the seams as a destructive force of nature arrives.

A British War fleet commanded by a Captain bent on revenge and destruction, arrives offering an ultimatum to destroy the town within 2 hours, regardless of the people who can't evacuate. The town was able to convince the Captain to give them 24 hours instead and now must spend the next 24 hours to evacuate and save as many people as possible.

In the span of 2 days, in this Story-Rich Historical Adventure, experience over 2000+ people and the city through several main characters, who they are, what they thought, what they did, their stories, the city itself and its stories and mysteries, before it's fiery and furious destruction at the hands of the British War Fleet.

Q gbeleovcleu icpec vq rirlqnipq

Demo Coming Soon: Q1 2025

Features:

  • OVER 2000+ NPCS! The city of Falmouth at the time had at least 2000+ people living. The game will bring them and the city itself to life!

  • NO NAMELESS NPCS! That's right. Every single npc in Falmouth is interactable with their own historical databases, who they were, etc. There will be no nameless npcs in this game. No stone will be un-turned. Everyone will be accounted for. Everyone matters. Ignore this at your own peril.

  • MINI-GAMES TO PLAY! There will be many activities, events and mini-games to play. From simple board games like Chess to helping the townsfolk finishing their work before evacuating.

  • LINEAR STORY-LINE WITH MULTIPLE ENDINGS! A linear story-line with very rich dialogue and scenes but your actions still have consequences. Your choices will bear multiple endings. It's your choice.

  • EXPERIENCE THE AMERICAN REVOLUTION AT ITS RUBICON! Experience the midst and chaos of the 2 most important days of the entire Revolution. When the Revolution reached its Rubicon. The day when the reality set in for both sides as to what this war was going to be. What was at stake and how far each side are willing to go. There is no turning back now.

  • AND MANY MORE!

content_descriptors.notes: War violence, Gore, rape(s) or language implying such, tobacco use, self-harm, talk and implications if not shown depictions of suicide. Any other mature content not currently stated will be added at a later time.
